
q1
```{r}
set.seed(115)
titanic_split <- initial_split(titanic_data, prop = 0.8, strata = survived)
titanic_train <- training(titanic_split)
titanic_test <- testing(titanic_split)
dim(titanic_train)
dim(titanic_test)
```
